    • \PhpDocumentor2Wrapper

    Wrapper around PhpDocumentor2 (so we retain PHP 5.2 compatibility in the main task)

    author Michiel Rook
    version $Id: 9057464ff65111ebba5b7d12cad8349e152ecc1f $
    since 2.4.10
